wipText1: The CoopLyst platform is currently under development.
wipText2: Check back soon to organize your gaming groups!
adminRegDesc: Allow new users to create accounts
adminSiteUrlDesc: The public URL of your CoopLyst instance (used for SSO redirects)
adminCallbackUrlDesc: Set this as the Redirect URI in your Authentik provider
adminSsoEnabledDesc: Allow users to sign in via Authentik
adminAutoRedirectDesc: Redirect unauthenticated visitors directly to Authentik
adminSsoStep1Desc: Log in to your Authentik instance and go to Applications → Providers.
adminSsoStep2Desc: Click "Create", choose "OAuth2/OpenID Connect Provider", give it a name (e.g. "CoopLyst").
adminSsoStep3Desc: In the provider settings, add your callback URL as the Redirect URI:
adminSsoStep4Title: Copy Client ID and Client Secret
adminSsoStep4Desc: Authentik will generate a Client ID and Client Secret — paste them in the fields above.
adminSsoStep5Desc: In Authentik, find the provider's "OpenID Configuration URL" and paste it as the Authentik Base URL above (it ends with /.well-known/openid-configuration — paste the root URL before that).
ssoRedirectingMsg:
Redirecting you to the authentication platform...
If it does not work, click the button below.
ssoOnlyNoProvider: Authentication is not configured. Please contact the administrator.
adminSsoTestDesc: Verify that CoopLyst can reach Authentik and the credentials are valid (save first if you made changes)
profileSsoUnlinkConfirm: Unlink your SSO account? You will only be able to log in with your password.
profileSsoUnlinkDisabled: Set a local password first — otherwise you will be locked out
adminUserDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this user? This action cannot be undone.
adminUserErrorSelf: You cannot perform this action on yourself
adminSsoAutoRegisterDesc: Automatically create a new account when an unknown user logs in via SSO.
